casebody.data:
In the MATTER OF: M.B., B.B., and J.B. No. 270P17 Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 7, 2017 Mr. Edward Eldred, Attorney at Law, Mr. James E. Tanner, III, Attorney at Law, Chapel Hill, for Barefoot, Alicia Ms. Jennifer S. O'Connor, Attorney at Law, for Johnston County DSS Ms. Marie Hare Mobley, Attorney at Law, for M.B., et al.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 9th of August 2017 by Respondent (Mother) in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 7th of December 2017."
